mapper.select: select count(*) from member where MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
select count(*) from member where MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} and MEM_FAVOR is null and MEM_NAME is null and MEM_PHONE is null
SELECT MEM_ID as username, MEM_PWD as password, MEM_ENABLED as enabled, MEM_AUTH as authority FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{username}

select MEM_NO,MEM_ID,MEM_NAME,MEM_PHONE,MEM_ADDR2,MEM_ADDR3,MEM_IMG,MEM_FAVOR,MEM_ENABLED,MEM_AUTH from (select MEM_NO,MEM_ID,MEM_NAME,MEM_PHONE,MEM_ADDR2,MEM_ADDR3,MEM_IMG,MEM_FAVOR,MEM_ENABLED,MEM_AUTH, rownum r from ( select MEM_NO,MEM_ID,MEM_NAME,MEM_PHONE,MEM_ADDR2,MEM_ADDR3,MEM_IMG,MEM_FAVOR,MEM_ENABLED,MEM_AUTH from MEMBER order by MEM_NO desc) order by MEM_NO desc ) where r >= (#{pageNumber}-1)*10+1 and r <= #{pageNumber}*10
